thread.title: James Packer mansion sells for $60 million — property at similar price
thread.title_full: James Packer mansion sells for $60 million — property at similar price

author: Erin Forster
title: James Packer mansion sells for $60 million — property at similar price
text:
THE sale of James Packer’s extravagant six-storey Vaucluse Sydney mansion this week may have left a few billionaires reeling after missing out on the trophy home purchase of the year.
Snapped up for more than $60 million by billionaire Chinese property developer Dr Chau Chak Wing , the purchase easily eclipsed the previous highest sale price of $52 million, which was set by the prestige home Altona in Point Piper, Sydney, in 2013.
While those who were keen to get their hands on Mr Packer’s Wentworth Rd home might not be able to pick up an Australian property with quite the same credentials, there’s plenty of options abroad with a similar price tag.
Rustic heaven ... This ranch in Telluride, Colorado, is going for $80.2 million Source: Supplied
How much: $80.24 million
Where: Telluride, Colorado, USA
What: If Hollywood glamour is your thing, Tom Cruise’s ranch will tick plenty of boxes. Set on a 300 acre estate surrounded by alpine forest and just minutes from the world-class Telluride ski fields, the seven-bedroom, nine-bathroom home and guesthouse showcases breathtaking views of the towering snowy mountain peaks.
Texan paradise ... you can pick up this Houston estate in Texas for $58.48 million Source: Supplied
How much: $58.48 million
Where: Houston, Texas, USA
What: Texas might be better known for sprawling ranches than chateaus, but this Neoclassical mansion adds a welcome touch of European elegance to the countryside. Exquisite landscaped gardens frame the 2.5 acre estate with the 27,000sq m, eight-bedroom home taking centre stage.
Glamorous living ... this property takes up an entire floor in a fancy New York hotel and it could be yours for $68 million Source: Supplied
How much: $68 million
Where: Central Park, New York, USA
What: Comprising the entire 33rd floor of the iconic Ritz-Carlton Hotel complex, this private two-bedroom residence boasts sweeping views across New York’s Central Park. The detail and luxurious finishes that make up its interiors do well to outdo the spectacular vistas, with the library — inspired by Coco Chanel’s Paris apartment — a highlight.
Garden galore ... this seven-bedroom London manor is going for $68.38 million Source: Supplied
How much: $68.38 million
Where: Hampstead Garden Suburb, London, UK
What: This newly built, seven-bedroom London manor was designed by esteemed architect Liam O’Connor, who’s previous works include the Belgravia home of Count and Countess von Bismarck and the Commonwealth Gates at Hyde Park Corner. The beautiful gardens that surround the half acre block make it easy to forget the centre of London is just five miles away.
Rich living ... this four-bedroom home in Hong Kong could be yours for $58.41 million Source: Supplied
How much: $58.41 million
Where: Tung Tau Wan Rd, Hong Kong
What: Floor-to-ceiling windows capture unobscured vistas across Tai Tam Bay, located at the southern tip of the island, from the living room, dining room and master ensuite of this four-bedroom home. Sleek and stylish interiors are accentuated by top end finishes including marble floors, concealed lighting and bespoke wooden fixtures.
Idyllic ... this 14,000sq m estate in Spain will cost you $74.13 million Source: Supplied
How much: $74.13 million
Where: Alcudia Bay, Mallorca, Spain
What: Perched on a 14,000sq m estate atop Spain’s idyllic island Mallorca, this extravagant eight-bedroom home offers endless modern luxuries with an exterior that remains very much true to its Mediterranean setting. Looming columns frame the front of the home, which includes a movie theatre, wine cellar and indoor pool; while outside is a tennis court and additional swimming pool.
Rustic living ... this home in Rome is available for $59.66 million Source: Supplied
How much: $59.66 million
Where: Rome, Italy
What: This rustic Roman home has certainly been touched by Hollywood glamour, having previously been owned by film producer and husband of Sophia Loren, Carlo Ponti; and frequented by actors Kirk and Michael Douglas, Charlton Heston and Rex Harrison. Based on an old basalt quarry and surrounded by foliage that dates back to over a century, the estate comprises two separate dwellings with eight bedrooms in total and classic Italian interiors.
Italian haven ... pick up this winery for $71.1 million Source: Supplied
How much: $71.1 million
W here: Chianti, Florence, Italy
What: A wine lover’s paradise, Montespertoli is a winery in Chianti sitting on 300ha of land with 60ha alone being solely devoted to vineyards of Sangiovese, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cannaiolo, Trebbiano and Malvasia. Steeped in history, the estate also includes a 17th century villa and a restored farmhouse which has been divided into apartments. There is also a tennis court, a private pool and an original tower once used as a chapel but now including a terrace with lovely views.
Hollywood glamour ... live your best life in this Los Angeles property for $53 million Source: Supplied
How much: $53 million
Where: Los Angeles, California, USA
What: This Spanish-style estate designed by Paul Williams in 1931 has plenty of room for those who seek privacy. The nine-bedroom, nine-bathroom house offers ample space for hosting guests, with indoor entertainment areas including the family room, library or billiards room. No expense has been spared in terms of modern luxuries, with a gym, massage room, pool house tennis court, stream and teahouse all included.
Mediterranean paradise ... live in the heart of Miama for $74.8 million Source: Supplied
H ow much: $74.8 million
Where: Coconut Grove, Florida, USA
What: La Brisa is a Mediterranean/Spanish-style mansion in the heart of Miami’s esteemed Coconut Grove neighbourhood. The lavish nine-bedroom residence has direct ocean access and its sprawling interiors include 11 bathrooms, vaulted ceilings, marble floors, a guesthouse, maid quarters, sauna and multiple living and dining areas. The property also has a dock for a yacht and manicured private gardens.
